website_summaries.verdict: This smoker features a ton of great extras and is the top of the line for home smokers.
pros: Includes an integrated meat probe and large digital display
Choose between old smoke, hot smoke, and fast smoke
Control the smoker remotely with the Bluetooth feature
cons: Some buyers report trouble with the app

customer_reviews.title: Time management
customer_reviews.text: Used 4 times. Pork lion, prime rib, pork ribs and chicken legs all came out moist and delicious. Smokes great do not need to change tray to add smoke like the masterbuilt. This machine helps with time management for parents on the go but love the smokie flavor.
customer_reviews.author: wayne elkins

customer_reviews.title: Great choice if you are movin up from a smaller smoker
customer_reviews.text: Do not know how the guy is getting a sixty degree temp difference, did 2 briskets at six pounds per took em to 200 F internal wrapped at 175 in about 11 hrs at 225 with 2 racks of spare rips in with em just today, I have done Turkeys , cornish game hens, chickens, salmon a whole bunch of ribs . Love the hot smoke option and not having to bend over, the stand is really nice to have, and the large wood tray is nice to, have not messed with the app much but if you get out of range is the only time I have had it disconnect
customer_reviews.author: George Jung

customer_reviews.title: Great smoker but app is broken / not functional.
customer_reviews.text: The smoker itself is great with the exception of the wifi app not working. I tried both my iPhone and iPad and both could not connect with the smoker. I hope that a fix comes out soon for the app. Smoker is well made, insulated and has a large chip tray which lasts many many hours on one fill.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin L Whitehead

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Very happy with both hot and cold smoking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement for an similar smoker we bought at Costco that had tons of problems. So far this Smoke Hollow smoker is rockin'! Regular smoke cycle is awesome. We tried the cold smoke cycle for salmon and it was yummy. Haven't tried the quick smoke cycle yet, but we're excited to down the road
customer_reviews.author: Jill Hups

customer_reviews.title: Great smoker! I would never go back to charcoal ...
customer_reviews.text: Great smoker! I would never go back to charcoal or propane. The Bluetooth works really well paired with my Apple cell phone. It’s still hard for me to believe that I can control all aspects of the smoker with my cell phone. I have 3 sons and guess what they are getting for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: John R.

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Everything About this GRill is As ADVERTISED!! I would have given it 5 stars except for the fact that i've yet to see any owner of this product with the bluetooth function working. Unfortunate but, still a good electric smoker.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: im retracting my review
customer_reviews.text: after they sent me a new temperature sensor the smoker works great , why did they ship something that wasn't tested?? however the smoker is awesome, great PID control (look it up) but the blue tooth SUCKS, I suggest buying a Riida from amazon its a 2 channel temp monitor, great distance
customer_reviews.author: john ceresnak

customer_reviews.title: Is it really a smoker
customer_reviews.text: I really gotta say that I am not that impressed with this "smoker". Yes, it is a smoker but, from what I can figure it is only a smoker if you sit beside it and press the SMOKE button every twenty minutes. The product did indeed cook the meat but the smoke flavor was definitely not part of the taste. Maybe it's just me but I don't see how to change the settings for the cook time and / or temp.
customer_reviews.author: joey

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Have used it a few times to make brisket and smoked pork chops, which turned out to be delicious. Racks and trays easy to clean after each use. I like the Bluetooth app for monitoring and controlling the smoker, but wish it would maintain the connection better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great smoker!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve smoked several things in it now, work great and food has been turning out perfect. I have not had major issues with the Bluetooth, overall I’d say it works good and may just have to reconnect here and there. I’m very satisfied with the smoker.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: great smoker, pretty too
customer_reviews.text: super easy to set up,, works great, Neighbors want us t start a catering bussiness the food that omes outta this thing is moist beyond belief! We had no idea what we were doing but everything comes out great.
customer_reviews.author: eve.mccormick

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: The Bluetooth compatibility makes it so much easier to monitor the temperature when you don't want to walk out in the cold. We've had this smoker for two years now and have loved every minute spent smoking with it. I don't understand these issues that others are having with their Bluetooth not wanting to work with their smoker. We are very pleased!!!
customer_reviews.author: ccptt

customer_reviews.title: Temperature gauge.
customer_reviews.text: Temperature gauge is not accurate. I’ve called them and haven’t got it corrected .Bluetooth does not work at all even if you’re right next to it
customer_reviews.author: perna

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Had some shipping issues
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Had some shipping issues, but the smoker is excellent. I read some reviews about the app not working. Have zero problems. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler R.

customer_reviews.title: Smokin!
customer_reviews.text: The blue tooth is a gimmick. Everything else works great.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Martin

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy with the the Product
customer_reviews.text: Never worked from day one. Company did nothing for us. Would never buy another one. Bad Parts
customer_reviews.author: DuWayne Traut

customer_reviews.title: Ribs in box!!!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t know where to start. Purchased a new smoker from Amazon. Received a package that appeared to be tattered. No worries, as long as the original box is ok... Nope the original box inside is old and water logged smh. Stay positive, the smoker itself should be ok....... Oh hell nah!!! The smoker has smoke residue all over it and it smells like ribs just came out of it. Accessories thrown loosely throughout the box, and oh wow DENTS everywhere!!! Come’on AMAZON wth!!!
customer_reviews.author: T.C. Lott

customer_reviews.title: Don't purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Does not smoke! Probe does not work! Customer service is not helpful-chips stay in tray untouched even after pushing hot smoke option. 3 weeks old!
customer_reviews.author: KLuna

customer_reviews.title: Update: Center element went out...
customer_reviews.text: Worked great... Update: middle burner went out. Warranty issue, I assume. We'll see how that goes. will re-evaluate after...
customer_reviews.author: Jay Bob

customer_reviews.title: The smoker did not arrive in red. The smoker ...
customer_reviews.text: The smoker did not arrive in red. The smoker did not arrive with a stand as pictured . The smoker we received works well. It is messy to clean up so we smoke several thing when we use ours. I wish we would have received the red and the stand which is what I ordered
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: App never works. Cold smoke option wouldn't every keep the temp low enough, even on a 65° day. Not impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... learn everything about this smoker it seems to be good the food was good
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend is still trying to learn everything about this smoker it seems to be good the food was good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this smoker!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as an early Mother's Day present, I have done a brisket, Canadian bacon, smoked bacon and Pastrami, all have come out perfect. I like that to add wood chips or water to the water tray, you do not have to open the door and lose all your heat and smoke, well thought out. The blue tooth is works well and I have not had any issues with it. Easy to clean and I like the fast smoke feature and the fact that you can cold smoke, without having to add ice cubes. Very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Michi P.

customer_reviews.title: poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: this company is a joke. customer service is non-existent. they conveniently dont list a number in the support section. my blue tooth quit working. i found out it is no longer supported and the front controls dont work without blue tooth. so now i have a 500 dollar un-usable P.O.S sitting n the garage
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: These people writing 5 star reviews for this thing must be smoking more weed than food. Mine is s TOTAL P.O.S.! Never worked correctly. Thermostat is off by over 40 degrees and it produces NO SMOKE! Do yourself a favor and buy a Masterbuilt.
customer_reviews.author: David Mendez

product_meta.title: Smoke Hollow D4015RS 40-Inch Digital Electric Smoker with Smoke-Tronix Bluetooth Technology, Stand Included, Red
product_meta.description: Smoke Hollow-- Smoke Tronix digital smoker with Bluetooth capability is here to make your smoking experience easier and more enjoyable. Our mobile app allows you to operate your smoker from any smart device. The 40" cabinet has dual elements which allows for faster smoking and more even cooking. Smoke Tronix is the first smoker to offer a "cold smoking" setting, which allows you to smoke fish and cheeses without overcooking. The "fast smoke" setting will get your wood chips smoking in fifteen minutes, rather than waiting and waiting for the chips to smolder. The Smoke Tronix was designed by smokers, with the smoker in mind. Check out our app on iOS or Google Play and see the difference.
feature_bullets: 40&Quot; cabinet provides 4.5 cubic feet of cooking space with light for better visibility
Integrated meat probe, large digital display, LED light for better visibility
Dual elements for faster, more even cooking, 3-smoke options cold smoke/ hot smoke/ fast smoke
Easy fill water Port on side of smoker and large capacity wood chip drawer
Heavy duty stand included with wheels for easy access and mobility

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.4 out of 5 stars46 ratings3.4 out of 5 stars
